title: Topics in Economics: Introduction to Health Economics
description:
This module aims to help students to understand how the demand and supply of healthcare services interact to yield market outcomes (price, quantity, and quality) 
in  various  healthcare  markets,  such  as  US,  UK, Singapore, and China. Students will learn to analyse (1) the behaviour of consumers, insurers, physicians, and hospitals  using  basic  economic  frameworks;  (2)  the impacts of public policies in health and medical  care from an economic perspective.
